Name: Tempusia
About the game: Based on rewinding time mechanics, Tempusia is a puzzle platformer requiring a big cold head: 3 TIME-REWINDING MECHANICS In Tempusia, you can activate the 'rewinding effect,' and after it ends, a clone appears and copies everything the player did. To solve several puzzles, you must time the actions of the clones and the player. There is also the checkpoint mechanic, which allows you to return to some state of the game. The map is designed to have multiple ways, and there is a special button at the end of each way. After activating all the buttons, you can open the ending gate. You can also use the checkpoint to comeback after you finish one way.
